attributes.action: Scrap all road pricing plans and policies, including The goverments latest Road pricing zone plan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country will be divided into a patchwork of road-pricing areas with drivers charged varying rates no matter which roads they use. When will the Goverment listen to the people of the country and stop trying to tax us out of existence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
